Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29932 affecting package llvm for versions less than 12.0.1-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29932 affecting package llvm for versions less than 12.0.1-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package llvm is earlier than 12.0.1-8, affected by CVE-2023-29932
